taskforce_uuid.description: A unique identifier automatically generated for this taskforce.

task_id.description: The identifier of the associated task directive object (N taskforces : 1 task directive).

workflow_id.description: The identifier of the overarching workflow object (N*M taskforces : M task directives : 1 workflow).

timestamp.description: The epoch time when this taskforce was created.

priority.description: The priority level relative to other taskforces (usually, this value is inherited from the parent workflow object).

collector.description: DEPRECATED: The address of the HTCondor collector -- no longer used/needed.

schedd.description: The address of the HTCondor schedd.

anyOf.description: The number of workers in this taskforce's HTCondor cluster (immutable).

pilot_config.description: Configuration settings for the EWMS pilot.

tag.description: The image tag to use (e.g., '#.#.#', 'latest', or a feature branch tag). Note: tags like # or #.# are disallowed since these are mutable. This field is useful for repeatability.

image_source.description: the common name for the source of the image

environment.description: Environment variables and their corresponding values.

input_files.description: Paths to files to make available to the task container. These files must already be accessible on the AP.

worker_config.description: Configuration settings for the HTCondor cluster submission.

do_transfer_worker_stdouterr.description: Indicates whether to transfer back the workers' stdout and stderr (accessible on the AP).

max_worker_runtime.description: The maximum runtime for a worker. Adjust this to optimize performance (e.g., to terminate slow CPUs).

n_cores.description: The number of cores to request per HTCondor worker.

priority.description: The priority level for the HTCondor submission.

anyOf.description: The amount of disk space to request per HTCondor worker.
The amount of memory to request per HTCondor worker.

condor_requirements.description: The 'requirements' string given to the HTCondor submission.

anyOf.description: The identifier for the associated HTCondor cluster.

submit_dict.description: The actual HTCondor submit class ad.

job_event_log_fpath.description: The file path on the HTCondor AP containing job event logs.

phase.description: The current phase of the taskforce within the workflow's lifetime. Not all taskforces will enter every phase.

phase_change_log.description: A record of all attempted phase changes, including both successful and unsuccessful ones.

target_phase.description: The phase that the system was attempting to transition to.

timestamp.description: The epoch timestamp when this phase change attempt was recorded in the system.

was_successful.description: Indicates whether the phase change was completed successfully, i.e. did it actually change?

anyOf.description: The epoch timestamp of the external event that led to this phase change attempt.
Indicates no specific external event was tied to this phase change.

source_entity.description: The entity (person, system, or process) responsible for the external event that triggered this phase change attempt.

context.description: The circumstances or background information about the phase change attempt.

compound_statuses.description: Aggregated status of the workers, represented as a nested dictionary mapping HTCondor states to EWMS pilot states and their counts.

top_task_errors.description: The most common errors encountered by workers, paired with their occurrence counts.
